metrics.name: dependency_chain_latency
metrics.description: Total time to execute deep dependency chain

metrics.name: parallelization_efficiency
metrics.description: How well the framework parallelizes independent work

metrics.name: dependency_wait_time
metrics.description: Average time agents wait for dependencies

metrics.name: fanout_total_time
metrics.description: Total time for fanout pattern execution

metrics.name: consumer_avg_wait
metrics.description: Average wait time for consumers

metrics.name: consumer_start_spread
metrics.description: Spread in consumer start times (lower = better coordination)

metrics.name: diamond_dag_time
metrics.description: Time to resolve and execute diamond DAG

metrics.name: dag_execution_efficiency
metrics.description: How efficiently the DAG is executed vs theoretical minimum

metrics.name: max_dependency_resolution_time
metrics.description: Maximum time any agent waits for dependencies

metrics.name: failure_handling_time
metrics.description: Time to handle failures and retries

metrics.name: failure_recovery_rate
metrics.description: Proportion of agents that eventually succeeded

metrics.name: retry_efficiency
metrics.description: Average attempts needed per agent

metrics.name: isolation_execution_time
metrics.description: Time to execute with isolated failures

metrics.name: failure_isolation_rate
metrics.description: Rate of successful isolation from failures

metrics.name: partial_success_rate
metrics.description: Proportion of agents that completed despite other failures

metrics.name: resource_contention_time
metrics.description: Total time under resource pressure

metrics.name: contention_overhead_ratio
metrics.description: Ratio of wait time to work time

metrics.name: resource_utilization_efficiency
metrics.description: How efficiently resources are utilized

metrics.name: memory_pressure_time
metrics.description: Time to execute under memory pressure

metrics.name: memory_allocation_efficiency
metrics.description: Efficiency of memory allocation and cleanup

metrics.name: peak_memory_usage
metrics.description: Peak additional memory used during execution

metrics.name: scaling_efficiency
metrics.description: How well throughput scales with agent count

metrics.name: throughput_consistency
metrics.description: Coefficient of variation in throughput (lower is better)

metrics.name: max_throughput
metrics.description: Maximum achieved throughput

metrics.name: coordination_overhead_growth
metrics.description: How coordination overhead grows with complexity

metrics.name: max_coordination_latency
metrics.description: Maximum coordination latency observed

metrics.name: coordination_scalability
metrics.description: Inverse of overhead growth (higher is better)

description: Orchestration-focused benchmarks measuring workflow complexity, error handling, resource management, and scalability
